property.name: hdfsproxy.https.address
property.description: the SSL port that hdfsproxy listens on

property.name: hdfsproxy.dfs.namenode.address
property.description: namenode address of the HDFS cluster being proxied

property.name: hdfsproxy.https.server.keystore.resource
property.description: location of the resource from which ssl server keystore information will be extracted

property.name: hdfsproxy.user.permissions.file.location
property.description: location of the user permissions file

property.name: hdfsproxy.user.certs.file.location
property.description: location of the user certs file

property.name: hdfsproxy.ugi.cache.ugi.lifetime
property.description: The lifetime (in minutes) of a cached ugi

property.name: hdfsproxy.kerberos.principle
property.description: kerberos principle to be used by hdfsproxy

property.name: hdfsproxy.kerberos.keytab
property.description: kerberos keytab to be used by hdfsproxy

property.name: hdfsproxy.kerberos.default.realm
property.description: kerberos default realm appended to non-qualified userIds
